2025-02-17.title: China’s Xi meets with business leaders, including Alibaba co-founder Jack Ma, to boost economy
2025-02-17.description: BANGKOK (AP) — China’s President Xi Jinping met with private sector business leaders on Monday, state media reported, as government officials work to revive an economy disrupted by a pandemic, regulatory crackdowns and a real estate crisis. Among the delegate…

2025-02-17.title: China’s Xi hosts top tech bosses, Alibaba co-founder Jack Ma spotted in attendance
2025-02-17.description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping hosted Alibaba co-founder Jack Ma and the country’s top tech executives in Beijing on Monday, in a meeting that signals officials could be steering the country in a more business-friendly direction after a yearslong regulatory crackd…

2025-02-13.title: Apple picks Alibaba to launch AI features in China | CNN Business
2025-02-13.description: Apple will work with Chinese tech giant Alibaba to roll out AI services in the world’s biggest market for mobile phones, in a move that removes months of uncertainty for the Cupertino-based firm.

2025-02-24.title: Alibaba shares tumble as Trump order stirs China trade angst
2025-02-24.description: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd shares tumbled as Donald Trump’s latest executive order stirred fears about deepening trade tensions. Read more

2025-03-06.title: Chinese AI: Manus ‘agent’ and Alibaba’s new model released in quick succession
2025-03-06.description: The Chinese tech giant unveiled its latest AI reasoning model on Thursday, saying it beats rivals from OpenAI and DeepSeek. The day before another company launched a “general AI agent” called Manus.

2025-03-24.title: Tencent upgrades AI model to compete with DeepSeek, Alibaba
2025-03-24.description: A team of Tencent engineers claimed in an event streamed online that the new model has cutting-edge logic and writing capabilities, with few hallucinations or distortions
